title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.3 - Compulsory interest arbitration pursuant to section 209.4 of the act
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4 ยง 205.3 - Compulsory interest arbitration pursuant to section 209.4 of the act

State Regulations

The following relates to impasses in collective negotiations
between a public employer and a recognized or certified employee organization
as to the conditions of employment of employees covered by the provisions of
section
209.4
of the act. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 4
ยง
205.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 2, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 31, eff. 8/2/2017

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
